net.kuujo.copycat.raft

Interface Operation<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Command<T>, Query<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Apply.All, Filter.All

    public interface Operation<T>
extends Serializable
    Base type for Raft state operations.

    This is a base interface for operations on the Raft cluster state.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
    See Also:
    Command, Query

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Operation.Builder<T extends Operation.Builder<T,U,V>,U extends Operation<V>,V>
      Base builder for Raft state operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends Operation.Builder>
      T      		 builder(Class<T> type, Function<BuilderPool,T> factory)
      Returns a cached instance of the given builder.

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        static <T extends Operation.Builder> T builder(Class<T> type,
                                               Function<BuilderPool,T> factory)
        Returns a cached instance of the given builder.

        Custom Operation implementations can use this method to retrieve a cached instance of a Operation.Builder. Builders returned by this method are internally pooled and reused to reduce GC overhead.

        Parameters:
        type - The builder type.
        Returns:
        The builder.
